title: SEE MORE
body:
Why do i have to keep clicking SEE MORE to see the replies in threads? Is there an option to just see all the replies (maybe with the exception of a -10 score or something?)

Whose idea was it to have users click SEE MORE 50 times in a thread? I thought the point of a forum was to see what people had to say? Why this barrier?

replies.body:
Hey Blunts4Brekfast!

I completely understand your frustration.  I personally experience this issue from time to time as well, and I believe it started after we made a broad update to the Community Beta on January 31st.  I suspect that this is occurring due to old cookies/cache for the League of Legends website.  To that end, I strongly recommend that you clear your cookies/cache for your web browser for League of Legends.  If you need help in completing this step, make sure that you check the following link:

https://riotgames.zendesk.com/entries/21947484-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies

Let me know if you are still experiencing the "SEE MORE" issue when you view a community!
And how do I get people to see my threads? I know almost nobody is going to sort by new.
I always sort by recent. I do think something like the endless pages feature on Reddit's RES would be pretty nice here. I'll make a suggestion.
